ping-command-description: Pings the bot. Returns information about the bot's latency.
ping-result:
> Interaction creation timestamp: `{0}ms`
> Message creation timestamp: `{1}ms`
> 
> Message creation latency = `{1}ms - {0}ms` = `{2}ms`

> Bot WS ping: `{3}ms`

Total latency = `{2}ms + {3}ms` = `{4}ms`
reload-bot-command-description: Reloads the bot settings, data and language information.
reload-all-command-description: Reloads the bot manager as well as all running bots.
execute-command-description: Executes code provided through a modal.
stop-bot-command-description: Stops the current bot from running.
